alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 2:58PM MST until January 01 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM FRIDAY TO NOON MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Plateau, Chuska Mountains and Northwest Highlands. * WHEN...From 6 AM Friday to noon MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery or snow packed road conditions. Travel delays are possible. These hazardous conditions will impact the holiday travel period.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for New Mexico can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, 1-800-432-4269, or visiting nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau
